# 2020 微服务领域开源数字化报告

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/x2020-wei-fuwu-lingyu-kaiyuan-shuzihua-baogao
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/x2020-wei-fuwu-lingyu-kaiyuan-shuzihua-baogao
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install x2020-wei-fuwu-lingyu-kaiyuan-shuzihua-baogao
x2020-wei-fuwu-lingyu-kaiyuan-shuzihua-baogao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xerlingerling-wei-fuwu-lingyu-kaiyuan-shuzihua-baogao
xerlingerling-wei-fuwu-lingyu-kaiyuan-shuzihua-baogao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
